title: 64B.45 PROHIBITION ON ANNOUNCEMENTS.
text: Except as otherwise required under sections 64B.40 to 64B.48, the making, publishing, dissemination, circulating, or placing before the public, or causing, directly or indirectly to be made, published, disseminated, circulated, or placed before the public, in a newspaper, magazine, or other publication, or in any other way, an advertisement, announcement, or statement containing an assertion, representation, or statement with regard to the risk-based capital levels of a society, or of any component derived in the calculation, by a society, agent, broker, or other person engaged in any manner in the insurance business would be misleading and is prohibited.
